short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pop-up menu after selection with copying and searching for selected text in Google (or other search engines)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select the text and click on one of the buttons in the pop-up menu (copy or search in Google (or other search engines)). See extension preferences to choose your own search engine.
